S02bsu017_u:1_0: namo ratnatrayāya / nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /
S02bsu017_u:2_0: tasmai namaskṛtvā idamāryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇaṃ vajradharamahīyaṃ hayagrīvaṃ nāma paramahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmisarvakarmārthasādhakam /
S02bsu017_u:3_0: om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka jvalitavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarāṭopapravṛddhavega vajrakhuranirghātaka calitavasudhātala niḥsvasitahasitamārutotkṣiptadharaṇīdhara parabhṛtagaṇasamūhavikṣobhaṇakara paravidyāsaṃbhakṣaṇakara sarvagrāhotsādanakara paramaśāntikarasarvagrahapraśamanakara budhya budhya dhāva dhāva ca bhagavā hayagrīva khāda khāda paramaṃtrām /
S02bsu017_u:3_1: rakṣa rakṣa kṣamasva kṣamasva sa mayābhihitāṃ mantrām /
S02bsu017_u:3_3: ghorapiśāca sarvagraheṣvapratihato mama varavajradaṃṣṭra kiṃ cirāpayasi /
S02bsu017_u:3_4: idaṃ duṣṭagrahaṃ duṣṭasattvaṃ duṣṭapiśācaṃ vā dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna kampa kampa matha matha pramatha pramatha /
S02bsu017_u:3_5: tathāgatājñāṃ pālaya buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ [Hgv_44] kuru kuru mā vilamba /
S02bsu017_u:3_6: hayagrīvāya phaṭ vajrakhurāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrotkaṭabhayabhairavāya phaṭ /
S02bsu017_u:3_8: paramantravināśakāya phaṭ / sarvagrahotsādakāya phaṭ / sarvaviṣaghātakāya phaṭ / sarvagraheṣvapratihatāya phaṭ /
S02bsu017_u:3_10: yāvanto mamaye kecitahitaiṣiṇastān sarvān vaḍavāmukhena nikṛntaya phaṭ /
S02bsu017_u:3_12: sidhyantu mama maṃtrapadā hayagrīvo bhagavān ājñāpayati svāhā /
S02bsu017_u:4_0: ayaṃ hayagrīvavidyā rājā paṭhitasiddhaḥ upacāraḥ ātmarakṣājāpena pararakṣā paṃcaraṃgīsūtram ekaviṃśatigranthayaḥ kṛtvā bandhitavyam /
S02bsu017_u:4_3: sarvaparakṛtā maṃtrāśchinnā bhavanti sarvaśatravastambhanaṃ manasā vyavahāre svakham mukhe kṛtvā vidyā japtayā uttarāyati /
S02bsu017_u:4_4: spṛṣṭāveśaneṣusnātaṃ śucivastraprāvṛtaṃ śucau pradeśe sumanasāsaṃbaddhā āveśaye śuklavaliryathālaṃbhena /
S02bsu017_u:4_5: candragrahe sūryagrahe ghṛtaṃ tāmrabhājane kṛtvā tāvajjepadyāvaccandro mukto bhavati taṃ ghṛtaṃ pive medhāvī bhavati ekenoddeśena ślokaśatamudgṛṇhāti /
S02bsu017_u:4_14: bhasmanā sarṣapeṇa udakena sapta japtena rakṣā kartavyā /
S02bsu017_u:4_15: sīmābandhaḥ kṛto bhavati / sarvamudrāmokṣaṇam udakena vaśīkaraṇaṃ phalapuṣpādyaiḥ /
S02bsu017_u:4_16: ayaṃ paṭhitasiddhaḥ / asādhita eva sarvakarmāṇi kurute /
